alert.note: Alert for Emanuel; Johnson; Laurens; Montgomery; Toombs; Treutlen (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 4:17PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Laurens, southwestern Emanuel, northwestern Toombs, Treutlen, southern Johnson and northern Montgomery Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 417 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Orland, or near Soperton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Swainsboro, Soperton, Vidalia, Adrian, Nunez, Tarrytown, Lothair, Covena, Orland, Rockledge, Orianna, Norristown, Barnhill, Kibbee, Norristown Junction, Blackville, Zaidee, Gillis Springs and Scott. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Emanuel; Johnson; Laurens; Montgomery; Toombs; Treutlen
